Title: Typo3 Information Disclosure in Backend User Interface
Description: The element information component used to display properties of a certain record is susceptible to information disclosure. The list of references from or to the record is not properly checked for the backend userâ€™s permissions. A valid backend user account is needed in order to exploit this vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.27, all versions starting from 9.0.0 before 9.5.8
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.27 before 9.0.0, all versions starting from 9.5.8
